content: humboldt mat kladney - 2020 @that hat over there gauge supplies needed skills needed 4 x4 stockinette worsted weight yarn knitting in the round 22 5 row x 15 stitches 150y color a knit/purl us 5-9 3 5-5 5mm 25y each of color b/c/d/e slip_stitch cdd center double decrease cdd instructions slip 2 stitches as if to work k2tog k1 pass both slipped stitches over the knit stitch ​ knitting notes this hat uses mosaic knitting to create the pattern if you haven t used mosaic knitting before it is the easiest way to add colorwork into a pattern - perfect for beginners who have gotten knit and purl down and want to add something a little more complex pattern row 1 co 96 in color a with any stretchy cast on i prefer long tail row 2 color a join k1 p1 around place marker row 3-10 color a k1 p1 around row 11 color a k1 around row 12 color b sl1 k1 around row 13 color b sl1 p1 around row 14-15 color a k1 around row 16 color c sl1 k1 around row 17 color c sl1 p1 around row 18-19 color a k1 around row 20 color d sl1 k1 around row 21 color d sl1 p1 around row 22-23 color a k1 around row 24 color e sl1 k1 around row 25 color e sl1 p1 around row 26-27 color a k1 around row 28-43 repeat row 12-27 row 44-59 repeat row 12-27 humboldt mat kladney -
